metadata.title: CVE-2017-9104 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in adns before 1.5.2. It hangs, eating CPU, if acompression pointer loop is encountered.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9104` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adns-tools - 1.6.0-2
libadns1 - 1.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adns package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-2').
